column4: Hello! I wanna some help with PXE Boot and Ubuntu install using an ISO instead a CD or DVD.. Could you help me?
what part do you want help with
what part of pxe booting do you need help with ?
I've asked you 2 times
thats great
what part, as your pxe config just points at the url for the install process
so, how can i can do network install like a normal install, with the installer getting files from apache webserver?
can you see the part in the howto where your create the ".cfg" file
i created it
that file should point at the repo your going to install from
as it shows in the example
let me see, a moment
here?
I can't see the url 192.168.x
so, i have to point to my webserver ip, is just it
no
your config file needs to point at an ubuntu repo
i have a link to a ubuntu local repo in my webserver
ok - that should be fine
cool! i'll try! thank you... you made my belief on this channel turn back!
don't worry - if you have specific problems, come back and we'll walk through them
ok! thank you again
